record.title: MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 3495 and H.R. 3685
record.narrative:
MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 3495 and H.R. 3685 -- (Senate - November 08, 2007)

[Page: S14234]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand there are two bills at the desk. I ask for their first readings en bloc.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will report.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 3495) to establish a National Commission on Children and Disasters, and for other purposes.
A bill (H.R. 3685) to prohibit employment discrimination on the basis of sexual orientation.

speaking.paragraph: I now ask for their second reading en bloc, and I object to my own request en bloc.
